detailsofRole: Working with a wide variety of client websites including Hyundai UK national website.
Creating bespoke pages for new Hyundai campaigns and making amendments to existing pages.
Using various CMS's to update content.
Working in a development team using Jira and working closely with project managers.
Using SASS with BEM to create maintainable,scalable CSS and styled components on more recent projects using BrowserStack to test on all devices and platforms.
Updating and designing the Hyundai configurator application using Gatsby and Redux
Working with the design team to update keys part of the Ocado Fetch website using CSS, HTML and Contentful from XD designs from the Graphic design team.
Using Contentful, Trello, Abode Creative Suite and Slack to make a high volume amount of website updates to specified deadlines.
Working in an agile team developing a new online store which will be used by the charity to sell their own products.
Using CSS, HTML and JS to build the front end.
My front-end Tech stack- CSS, HTML, Javascript.

projects.name: Ecommerce audio shop app
projects.description: Full stack e commerce store developed from sketch designs using the MERN stack, react testing library and several additional NPM packages such as Formik and React transition group.

projects.name: Invoice application
projects.description: An invoice application created from sketch designs uses React, Formik and React Transition Group to create a visually pleasing and slick experience for the user.

projects.name: Photosnap website
projects.description: This website using Gatsby and Contentful as a headless CMS with API calls made using GraphQL. This website uses SASS with the BEM methodology for the styling.

projects.name: React calculator
projects.description: This calculator was built as a project as part of the freeCodeCamp cirriculum. This project allowed me to combine many functions and uses React prevstate and e.persist to make the project work.
